cause.description:
Many groups tackle individual issues, but the issue is a unified one For those of you who believe in sacrificing for the greater good of society as a whole
1. Abortion is inethical, and must be illegalized
2. Drugs of any sort are immoral, and should not be tolerated
3. Gay marriage and other abnormal sexual behaviors should be discouraged strongly
4. Animal rights and the environment, while important, should not damage businesses
5. Minority rights should not be priority rights
cause.name: Unified Conservative Theory
